verses.verse: I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>; I will show <S%H5608>forth<s%> all your marvelous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
I will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5970>rejoice<s%> in <S%H2167>you<s%>: I will sing praise to your <S%H8034>name<s%>, O you most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
When my <S%H341>enemies<s%> are <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>, they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> and <S%H6>perish<s%> at your <S%H6440>presence<s%>.
For you have <S%H6213>maintained<s%> my <S%H4941>right<s%> and my <S%H1779>cause<s%>; you <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H8199>judging<s%> <S%H6664>right<s%>.

You have <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, you have <S%H6>destroyed<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, you have put <S%H4229>out<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

O you <S%H341>enemy<s%>, <S%H2723>destructions<s%> are come to a <S%H5331>perpetual<s%> <S%H8552>end<s%>: and you have <S%H5428>destroyed<s%> <S%H6145>cities<s%>; their <S%H2143>memorial<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%> with <S%H1992>them<s%>.
But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H3427>endure<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: he has <S%H3559>prepared<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
And he shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, he shall minister <S%H1777>judgment<s%> to the <S%H3816>people<s%> in <S%H4339>uprightness<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also will be a <S%H4869>refuge<s%> for the <S%H1790>oppressed<s%>, a <S%H4869>refuge<s%> in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.
And they that <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> will put their <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>you<s%>: for you, Lord, have not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> them that seek <S%H1875>you<s%>.
Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: <S%H5046>declare<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%>.
When he makes <S%H1875>inquisition<s%> for <S%H1818>blood<s%>, he <S%H2142>remembers<s%> <S%H7911>them<s%>: he forgets not the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H6035>humble<s%>.

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord; <S%H7200>consider<s%> my <S%H6040>trouble<s%> which I suffer of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7311>me<s%>, you that lift me up from the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>:

That I may show <S%H5608>forth<s%> all your <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

The <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are sunk <S%H2883>down<s%> in the <S%H7845>pit<s%> that they <S%H6213>made<s%>: in the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> they <S%H2934>hid<s%> is their own <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H3920>taken<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> by the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> which he <S%H6213>executes<s%>: the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5367>snared<s%> in the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his own <S%H3709>hands<s%>. <S%H1902>Higgaion<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%> into <S%H7585>hell<s%>, and all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7913>forget<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
For the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall not <S%H5331>always<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>: the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> shall not <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; let not <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H5810>prevail<s%>: let the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> be <S%H8199>judged<s%> in your <S%H6440>sight<s%>.
<S%H7896>Put<s%> them in <S%H4172>fear<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> themselves to be but <S%H582>men<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
